titles.400: In The Name Of The Moon!
titles.default: In The Name Of The Moon!

messages.400: Your request data is corrupted! Moon Healing Escalation will fix the malformed syntax!
messages.401: You lack the magic crystal for access! Transform with proper credentials!
messages.402: This content requires Sailor Scout payment! Venus Love and Beauty Shock requires coins!
messages.403: Dark forces block your path! Mars Flame Sniper cannot penetrate this barrier!
messages.404: The page has vanished into the Dark Kingdom! Moon Spiral Heart Attack cannot locate it!
messages.405: Wrong magical spell detected! Jupiter Oak Evolution requires a different method!
messages.406: The crystal format is incompatible! Mercury Aqua Mirage needs different data!
messages.408: The transformation took too long! Saturn Death Reborn cannot wait forever!
messages.409: Two magical forces collide! Neptune Submarine Reflection detects conflict!
messages.410: The page returned to stardust! Uranus Space Sword cannot recover what's gone!
messages.413: The magical energy is too powerful! Pluto Garnet Ball cannot handle this payload!
messages.429: Too many transformations at once! Moon Princess Halation is overloaded!
messages.500: The Silver Crystal has shattered! Starlight Honeymoon Therapy cannot fix the server!
messages.502: The gateway to the Moon Kingdom failed! Rainbow Moon Heartache detects errors!
messages.503: The Sailor Scouts are unavailable! Moon Cosmic Power is under maintenance!
messages.504: The teleport circle timed out! Moon Eternal power took too long to respond!
messages.default: Moon Crystal Power! Transform this error!

descriptions.400: In the name of the moon, I'll punish your bad syntax!
descriptions.401: In the name of the moon, I'll punish your lack of credentials!
descriptions.402: In the name of the moon, I'll punish your unpaid account!
descriptions.403: In the name of the moon, I'll punish this forbidden access!
descriptions.404: In the name of the moon, I'll punish this missing page!
descriptions.405: In the name of the moon, I'll punish this wrong method!
descriptions.406: In the name of the moon, I'll punish incompatible formats!
descriptions.408: In the name of the moon, I'll punish this timeout!
descriptions.409: In the name of the moon, I'll punish this conflict!
descriptions.410: In the name of the moon, I'll accept this permanent loss!
descriptions.413: In the name of the moon, I'll punish this oversized payload!
descriptions.429: In the name of the moon, I'll punish excessive requests!
descriptions.500: In the name of the moon, I'll punish this server error!
descriptions.502: In the name of the moon, I'll punish this bad gateway!
descriptions.503: In the name of the moon, I'll punish this downtime!
descriptions.504: In the name of the moon, I'll punish this gateway timeout!
descriptions.default: In the name of the moon, I'll punish this error!

footers.402: Never running from a payment fight! ✨
footers.403: She is the one named Sailor Access Denied! ✨
footers.405: Finding the right method by daylight! ✨
footers.406: Never backing down from a format fight! ✨
footers.408: She is the one who waits for timeouts! ✨
footers.413: Never running from a big file fight! ✨
footers.429: She is the one called Rate Limit Moon! ✨
footers.503: Never running from downtime! She is Sailor Service! ✨
footers.504: She is the one who battles lag! Sailor Timeout! ✨
footers.default: Fighting evil by moonlight, fixing errors by daylight! ✨
